website_summaries.verdict: These compact kids' walkie-talkies are both affordable and durable.
pros: Push-to-talk operation is easy for kids to use
LCD display ideal for night use
cons: Can be hard for child to hold down transmission button
Sometimes difficult for kids to get both walkie-talkies on same channel

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a great deal. These work as well as other higher-end radios I have had in the past. These are great when the kids are out and about in the neighborhood and need to be reached. Long-distance and decent battery life. My kids participate in a weekly forest school and the group of kids likes to go hiking on their own at times. Now I’ve learned to pack an extra set of batteries so if anything should happen they will be able to get help. The range has been great. Where we usually hike has a lot of hills. If we go too far down we may experience more static but can hear somewhat the other person is saying.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but slightly d difficult to push the ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but slightly d difficult to push the transmission button for a child 4 or under .... our four-year-old grandson was able to push the button but it was difficult to hold it down for an extended period of time
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great reception
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Great Grandkids have a fun time with these. We can talk as far as 100' away, maybe more. Use outside and inside, no interference. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: NOT Kid Friendly
customer_reviews.text: They work fine however I don't recommend it for kids. Very difficult to use, super easy to change settings and super difficult to change them back. Can't lock settings, kids will keep changing channels. Not kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh..we gave these walkie talkies to our now 6 year old nephew at a family birthday ...He opened them immediately and played with them non-stop for the better part of the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Brend

customer_reviews.title: Best Walkie Talkies for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love using walkie-talkies and maintaining a direct line of communication for their latest plans and adventures. This is easy to use and comes with a flashlight for when things get darker and forms of light add guidance. All the buttons, like the on/off, push-to-talk and channel selector is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dominque Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Walkie talkie as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my nephews as a gift. They have a large house and like most boys like to play games. The range is great and is clear both ways each time and they are simple to use. The Best Walkie Talkie Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Walkie Talkies 8 year old toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought Kids Walkie Talkies for my nephew 8 years old, He plays with them all the time, The sound does come thru clear with no static. We have used them for camping and they do cover a far range. I thought the built in flash light was great because they did come in handy several times. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Luis William

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my Niece's two daughters for a birthday gift. Very easy to use, Even though they're being used as entertainment, they are not toys. Very good quality with good range. SO MUCH FUN! I'm so glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Man

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME!
customer_reviews.text: Good luck.. there is switch off button and batteries are draining too fast ... probly last hardly 30 mins while kids play and have to replace again...
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent, but range is limited.
customer_reviews.text: The range is not nearly what is advertised, but overall they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVE her talkie
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our 8 year old. Lots of fun and stuff to do. I'll be getting more for my other children.
customer_reviews.author: Bryana Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Walkie Talkies for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Great quality walkie talkies. These have been great to use with my son as he runs around the neighborhood. Excellent sound quality and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Walkie-Talkie for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This Kids Walkie-Talkie Set is good communication everything, fans of the series aged 3 years and upwards can take part in their own missions and adventures. children can transform any play area into their own little Pontyp
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto

customer_reviews.title: Batteries
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these communication devices. They are great. Put batteries in.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca T.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them, good price for kids gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a kids gift. The good: kiddos seem to love playing with them and the range is as far as two or three blocks over still worked good. The bad: kiddos always want to give me one and all I hear all day is random conversation. Hahaha Really though, $20 not terrible for a kids gift and they seem to have most features of adult ones
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: TINY!  these are VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: they arrived today, the box is about 3 inched wide and 6 inches tall x4 inches wide, that holds TWO! ok fro smaller kids like 4-7 years old, no batteries included No charging cord included , might be a fun Toy for kids playing outside , again TINY sized two side by side will be about the width of a adult palm
customer_reviews.author: Millasmomma

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful - These are NOT rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: Please change your item description so people dont get confused. They dont even provide the batteries!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlsant

product_meta.title: iCore Walkie Talkies for Kids, 22 Channel 2 Way Radio 3 Mile Long Range Kids Toys & Handheld Kids Walkie Talkies, Best Gifts & Top Toys for Boy & Girls Age 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 for Adventure Games (Red)
feature_bullets: 🎁 Kids Walkie Talkies Long Distance: With a long range communication up to 3km in open field and 1.5km in urban district, the children walkie talkie set is perfect army toys for boys and girls, kids having so much fun from their backyard & outdoor adventures with the walkie-talkie spy toys.
🎁 Gifts for Boys Girls: Perfect birthday gifts for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 years old boys and girls, for kids games, family playtime, camping, hiking, biking and other indoor/ outdoor activities.

🎁 Walki Talki with Stable Signal: With powerful transmitter and receiver, the walkie talkie's signal is stable and clear voice ensured even in noisy environment (background noise muted automatically).

🎁 Perfect Gift for Children]: Gift for 3-12 Year Old Boys, Teen Girl Gifts, Walkie Talkies for Kids Teen Boy Gifts Birthday. Great for both indoor and outdoor activities such as going shopping, spring outing and summer camping.

🎁 Super Clear Sound: Our Kids walkie talkies have cool call alert function, crisp and smooth sound quality with adjustable volume level. Equipped with high Anti-interference function to reduce noise to enhance the fun of parent-child interaction.
